title: $$cos\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)$$
text: cos is the x-coordinate of the point on the unit circle. So, $$cos\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)$$ $$=$$ $$\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}$$.

title: $$sin\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)$$
